doc.p: ORCID provides a persistent digital identifier that distinguishes you from every other researcher and, through integration in key research workflows such as manuscript and grant submission, supports automated linkages between you and your professional activities ensuring that your work is recognised.
doc.h3: What if I already have an ORCID ID?
doc.p: Click the 'Sign up for ORCID' button so that your ORCID ID will be connected to your profile.
